metadata.title: CVE-2017-6928 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Drupal core 7.x versions before 7.57 when using Drupal's private filesystem, Drupal will check to make sure a user has access to a file beforeallowing the user to view or download it. This check fails under certainconditions in which one module is trying to grant access to the file andanother is trying to deny it, leading to an access bypass vulnerability.This vulnerability is mitigated by the fact that it only occurs for unusualsite configurations.

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
